header.description:
Chunk Loaders keep things loaded around them, even when no one is around. This add-on supports a 2 chunk radius, 3 chunk radius, 4 chunk radius, 5 chunk radius, and 6 chunk radius. Keep in mind, lag is possible.
Chunk Loaders are actually quite simple, so this add-on is open source, free for anyone to use to their pleasure!

§lChangelog v1.0.2§r
Updated version number to match with MCPEDL (assuming I remember file verification)
Fixed an issue preventing chunk loaders from being summoned when stepping on the block, in the nether/end (#82)
header.name: Open Source Chunk Loaders v1.0.2 [RP]
